column1: Why howdy, partners, I'm the town gunsmith. You see, in our time it's pretty violent. See them holes in the walls? That's so we can put rifles through to protect us from Injuns.
Now some of you might wanna meet Abigail at the candle-makin' house. Or you can head over to the general store.
Let's go to TGI Fridays and get some jalape√±o poppers!
